table.name: vtiger_push_notification_logs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_push_notification_logs` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `content_type` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `content` text, `result` text, `date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `module` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_push_notification_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_push_notification_settings` ( `settings_name` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `settings_value` text NOT NULL, `settings_status` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`settings_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
